name: By the World's Wind
description:
Set sail across a small, open world. Visit island communities, explore lost caves, and meet the local wildlife with the four winds at your back. Use the map-making tools to plot a course or simply let the wind carry you where it will.

 

Features

  • Explore at your own pace. Let curiosity be your guide as you discover secret caves, hidden treasure, and cool little guys.
  • Draw a map of the islands you find or just make a pretty picture. It’s all good, baby!
  • Go where the wind takes you. Sail with the changing wind to speed across the open sea.
  • Listen to the sounds of the sea. Immerse yourself in dynamically changing wind, waves, and wildlife that pull you through the environment. 
  • Original, live-recorded score by the game designer.
